font.h1: Thanks for trying out the Splunk Wall of Sheep app
font.p:
This app takes advantage of several tools, built for capturing network traffic. They are:
- Splunk Stream
Support for these apps, bringing data into Splunk are:
- Splunk App for Stream
- URL Toolbox
- Custom Visualizations
- Splunk 6.x Dashboard Examples

This app was designed to assist in delivering the same message as the Wall of Sheep. It's purpose is to act as an educational tool and show what kind of information traverses a network and how it can be mis-used.

In addition to this app, you must install the supporting apps listed above. There are no indexes specified in the dashboard searches, so the indexes containing the requisite data must be made searchable by default.
Many thanks to the crew at the Wall of Sheep
